article_title: Medical Bills Pose Financial Problems For Americans With Insurance

twitter.title: Even Insured Americans Are Struggling With Medical Bills
twitter.description: Even as the Affordable Care Act has given more than 15 million Americans health insurance coverage, more than a quarter of working-age Americans still say that they’re struggling to pay off m...

article_metadata.sailthru.title: Even Insured Americans Are Struggling With Medical Bills
article_metadata.description: One-fifth of Americans with health insurance still struggle with medical bills, while more than half of uninsured patients face problems.
article_metadata.sailthru.description: As deductibles grow faster than workers' wages.
